results.title: [Effect of Zuogui Jiangtang Jieyu Formula on intestinal flora and short-chain fatty acid metabolism in rats with diabetes mellitus complicated with depression].
results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the regulatory effects of Zuogui Jiangtang Jieyu Formula(ZJJ) on the intestinal flora, @CHEMICAL_Fatty_Acids_Volatile @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005232 @@@short chain fatty acids@@@(@CHEMICAL_Fatty_Acids_Volatile @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005232 @@@SCFAs@@@), and @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@neuroinflammation@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Complications @DISEASE_MESH:D048909 @@@diabetes mellitus complicated@@@ @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@(@<m>DISEASE_Diastrophic_dysplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536170 @@@DD@@@). The @<m>DISEASE_Diastrophic_dysplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536170 @@@DD@@@ model was established in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and model @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly divided into a model group, a positive drug(@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Fluoxetine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005473 @@@fluoxetine@@@) group, a ZJJ low-dose group, and a ZJJ high-dose group, with eight @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ in each group.

citations.NLM: Li W, Lei SH, Wang JX, Liu L, Yang H. [Effect of Zuogui Jiangtang Jieyu Formula on intestinal flora and short-chain fatty acid metabolism in rats with diabetes mellitus complicated with depression]. Zhongguo Zhong Yao Za Zhi. 2024 Jan;49(1):208-215. PMID: 38403353
